name: Pivotal Computers
overview:
Pivotal Computers was founded in March 2012 in response to the communal need for affordable and expert computer service.

With experience gained from Intel Corp, General Electric, the United States Military (Army branch), and years working for IT service providers this company provides a breadth of knowledge that has surpassed many competitors.

Pivotal Computers began to offer mobile and on-site residential and business consultations and technical services to the people of Charleston, SC while branching outwards to corporate businesses in Tennessee and Georgia.

Pivotal Computers is a solutions company; it is solution oriented from the beginning. In life there are problems which create two kinds of people: those that solve problems and those that are in the way. The task at hand may be unique, it could also be a repeat. Pivotal Computers will service the entire spectrum of business and residential needs. When you hire Pivotal Computers the client’s situation is viewed personally and dealt with the upmost professionalism.
